job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
     * Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

   What s in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data/privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer

* Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
     * Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

   What s in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data/privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer success, service operations, and the use of AI tools to enhance productivity rather than the core development or deep technical implementation of AI models. While it mentions 'generative AI' as a technology to innovate support processes, it lacks the specific tasks and technologies associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer roles, such as algorithm development, model training, fine-tuning, or building RAG systems. The emphasis is on advising customers and improving service practices, aligning more with a customer-facing or business-oriented role.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations' and 'Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services', which requires understanding business goals and translating them into operational improvements.
job_tasks.phrase: Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations

job_tasks.justification: Advising customers on how to optimize the use of the solution within their operational landscape requires understanding both the product and the customer's business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape

job_tasks.justification: Deploying and integrating the company's solution within organizations suggests involvement in the technical implementation and integration of software, even if it's not core development.
job_tasks.phrase: Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations

job_tasks.justification: Improving customer service practices and support tools implies working with and potentially enhancing existing software or tools used for customer support.
job_tasks.phrase: Improving our customer service practices and support tools

job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing customer success metrics requires understanding business objectives and how to measure progress towards them.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services

job_tasks.justification: Identifying and implementing new methods for improving the customer service solution can involve leveraging or developing new tools and processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution

job_tasks.justification: Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing customer success, user experience, and support tools indicates hands-on work with software and systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes' indicates an interest in applying generative AI, which falls under modeling, to improve processes.
job_tasks.phrase: looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes

soft_skills.phrase: Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.
Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
Working with a young & ambitious team.
